name: Made of Sugar
description:
My entry for the OLC Codejam 2022

It is a small game based on the topic "weather" 

Game utilizes the OLC Pixel Game Engine 2.0

Help the sugar-cane people escape the rain storm.  Can you save them all?

Controls are simple: just guide the umbrella around with the mouse and prevent the sugar canes getting wet. 

The game reacts to left mouse button and space-bar  during the win/lose screen to skip.
